mapper.select: select i.item_id as id , d.images as imgUrl , i.full_name as fullName , i.weight as weight , d.retail as retail , c.promotion_total as promotionPrice, i.sales_volume as salesVolume , i.description as description , d.service_type as serviceType , d.place as place , i.shelf_life as shelfLife , i.brand as brand from wx_item i join wx_item_detail d on i.item_id = d.item_id left join wx_promotion c on c.promotion_id = d.promotion_id where i.item_id = #{id}
